views.markdown:
Fix crash when restarting mediaserverd Update for iOS11 compatibility. 2.1.0
Total rewrite/refactoring of Waveflow for iOS10 compatibility and tweak stability.
Rename title to Waveflow2
iOS10 hooks
Spotify updates
Visualisations rewritten
Switch IPC method from libobjcipc to rocketbootstrap
0.5.2
Improved performance during frequency analysis.
Refined audio tapping routines to fix compatibility with Equalizer Everywhere.
Improved stability of Lockscreen vizualisation.
0.4.9
Further customcover compatibility improvements.

0.4.8
Swipe to change song and view lyrics in Spotify now works
Tap and hold the center of the Waveform to toggle on/off (fixed)
0.4.6
Improved Customcover compatibility
(Changing customcover settings may now require a respring if waveflow is installed)
Tap and hold Waveflow to toggle on/off
No longer show Waveflow over videos
Fix rotation problem for landscape in spotify
Fix rotation problem on iPad lockscreen
Fix lockscreen on iOS9.
Fix preferences not writing correctly on first run.

0.4.3
Fixed spotify lockscreen lag.
Add switch to disable lockscreen visualisation (to avoid an iOS9 crash).
Write preferences differently to avoid sandbox violation.

0.4.1 changes:
iOS9 lockscreen support
Spotify App and lockscreen support
Bug/crash fixes
Only show Waveflow when Spotify/Music app is playing
File cleanup

Add ColorFlow integration: enable in preferences.

Change libobjcipc filename to fix conflics with other tweaks using libobjcipc.

Removed need for reboot on package install.

Rewrote gain implementation, fixing a bug where gain would default to 0.

Improved Bars algorithm so that it more accurately represents how humans hear.

Fixed bug where visualizations show in the Up Next view.
